Package org.daisy.dotify.tasks.impl.input.epub

Provides EPub 3 input support.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContainerReader
    Provides a parser for epub 3 container files (META-INF/container.xml).
    ContentExtractor
    Provides unpacking of epub 3 files.
    ContentMerger
    Provides an merger for epub 3 html files.
    Epub3InputManager
    Provides an epub 3 to html task group.
    Epub3InputManagerFactory
    Provides an factory for epub 3 to html conversion.
    Epub3Task
    Provides an epub to html task.
    EpubResourceLocator
    Provides a resorce locator relative to this class.
    OPF
    Provides a data object for an OPF-file.
    OPFReader
    Provides a reader of OPF-files.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EPUB3ReaderException
    Provides an exception for epub reading.

Package org.daisy.dotify.tasks.impl.input.epub Description

Provides EPub 3 input support.

IMPORTANT: This package contains implementations that should only be accessed using the Java Services API. Additional classes in this package should only be used by these implementations. This package is not part of the public API.
